name: Monster Car Stunts
description:
Perform amazing jumps and stunts and destroy objects in this amazingly addictive and fun to play game Monster Car Stunts!

Collect coins and destroy cars in a beautiful Arizona environment! Enjoy the monster stunt car mayhem, develop your car and get new cars to run with!

Monster truck games have never been this much fun. Perform amazing loops and jumps with the wrecking havoc and destruction of scrap cars in many levels of pure fun and joy.

Features:
- 30 fun to play levels.
- 3 cars to play with.
- Upgradable cars.
- Breakable environments, destructable scrap cars, exploding boxes, breakable trailers.
- Moving trucks to jump over.
- Different loops on tracks to have fun with.
- Collectable coins you can use to upgrade the cars.
- Long jumps.
- Powerful monster trucks.
- Challenge other players, using Gumbler.
